description: A number puzzle where you combine tiles to reach the ultimate goal of the number 1. Think strategically as each move counts. Every merge brings you closer to victory. Simple rules, but tricky gameplay.

title: 10 Bullets
description: Fire only 10 bullets and try to cause the biggest chain reaction possible. Each hit can explode into more destruction. Timing and accuracy are key to clearing the screen. Can you make every shot count?

title: 10 Minutes Till Dawn
description: Survive endless waves of monsters for 10 minutes. Use powerful weapons and upgrades to stay alive. Every second is intense and filled with danger. Only the strongest survive till dawn.

title: 10-103 Null Kevin
description: A dark, side-scrolling horror adventure. Explore unsettling environments filled with eerie enemies. Solve puzzles and survive encounters with terrifying creatures. A haunting sequel full of mystery.

title: 12 Mini Battles
description: Challenge a friend in quick-fire mini-games. From sports to combat, each round is unique. The controls are simple but the competition is fierce. See who becomes the ultimate champion.

title: 1 On 1 Soccer
description: A fun and simple soccer duel. One player defends, the other attacks. Outscore your opponent to claim victory. Fast-paced and unpredictable matches every time.

title: 1 On 1 Tennis
description: Play a classic tennis showdown. Rally the ball back and forth over the net. Score points by outsmarting your rival. Quick and competitive matches every round.

title: 1v1 lol
description: Shoot, build, and survive in intense battles. Test your aim and building skills against real players. Fast matches keep the action constant. Outsmart and outgun your opponent to win.

title: 1v1 lol (2)
description: Engage in third-person shooting duels. Build defenses while attacking with precision. Every match tests your reflexes and creativity. Prove you are the last one standing.

title: 2048 CupCakes
description: Slide colorful cupcakes on the grid. Merge them to create new and tastier treats. Keep combining until you reach the 2048 cupcake. Addicting, sweet, and fun to play.

title: 2Doom
description: A retro 2D version of DOOM. Fight classic enemies in pixel-art style. Blast your way through fast-paced levels. Old-school action with a new twist.

title: 2D Shooting Online
description: Jump into a 2D multiplayer battlefield. Use a variety of weapons to defeat rivals. Play in different maps and modes with friends. Action-packed matches every time.

title: 3Dash
description: A 3D twist on Geometry Dash. Jump, dodge, and time your moves perfectly. Create and play levels with the advanced editor. Rhythm, challenge, and creativity collide.

title: 4th And Goal
description: A football game with real playbook strategies. Run, pass, and score with no punts allowed. Use tactics to outsmart your opponentâ€™s defense. Every play feels like a big game moment.

title: 3 Slices 2
description: Cut blocks into pieces with just three moves. Drop red ones, float the blue ones. Gravity and timing matter with each slice. Clever puzzles keep you thinking ahead.

title: 60 Seconds Burger Run
description: Rush to serve burgers before time runs out. Collect ingredients as fast as you can. Assemble orders and keep the customers happy. A frantic race against the clock.

title: 60 Seconds Santa Run
description: Help Santa reach the toy factory. You only have one minute to succeed. Dodge obstacles and move quickly through the snowy path. A festive test of speed and skill.
Slide tiles on the board to combine numbers. Aim to create the legendary 2048 tile. Plan ahead or risk filling up the grid. A modern classic puzzle game.

title: 8 Ball Classic
description: Line up your cue and aim carefully. Pocket solids or stripes to clear the table. Strategic shots set you up for the win. Finish with the 8-ball to claim victory.

title: 8 Ball Pool
description: Challenge opponents in realistic pool matches. Call your shots and pocket balls in order. Compete for skill and precision to win. A timeless game of strategy and aim.
Step into a strange number realm. Logic twists and precision is challenged. Every move could shift reality itself. A puzzle beyond ordinary comprehension.

title: 40xescape
description: Escape from 40 unique puzzle rooms. Each challenge requires creative thinking. Solve clues to unlock the way forward. A simple yet clever test of wit.

title: 99 Balls
description: Shoot bouncing balls to break blocks. Each block has a number of hits required. Keep the blocks from reaching the bottom. Addictive and endless gameplay loop.

title: Abandoned
description: Search strange lands for your lost brother. Solve tricky puzzles along the way. Explore eerie worlds full of mystery. A haunting puzzle-adventure experience.

title: Abandoned 3
description: Explore an abandoned haunted house. Solve riddles and uncover hidden secrets. Every corner hides something unexpected. A chilling test of bravery and brains.

title: Amanda the Adventurer
description: Amanda the Adventurer is a creepy puzzle-horror game disguised as a children's cartoon. Watch lost VHS tapes, solve eerie clues, and uncover the dark secrets Amanda is hiding.

title: Basket Random
description: Play unpredictable ragdoll basketball. Courts, balls, and rules change constantly. Score baskets before your rival does. Funny, chaotic, and competitive fun.

title: Bloxorz
description: Bloxorz. Roll a rectangular block across tricky platforms and solve mind-bending puzzles. Navigate carefully, avoid falling, and reach the goal to advance through challenging levels.

title: Backrooms
description: Wander endless yellow halls in the Backrooms. Escape eerie rooms and avoid lurking dangers. The deeper you go, the harder it gets. Simple controls, chilling mystery.

title: Bad Parenting
description: Bad parenting involves consistent neglect of a childs emotional, psychological, or physical needs, causing lasting harm regardless of intent.

title: Chicken CS
description: Become a blocky battle chicken armed with powerful weapons! Fight in colorful arenas, blast your rivals, and prove who rules the coop in this fast-paced action shooter.

title: Clash Of Vikings
description: Clash of Vikings is a fast-paced strategy game where you summon warriors and cast spells to defeat your rival clan. Outsmart your opponent and destroy their base to claim ultimate victory.

title: Cluster Rush
description: Dash through colorful clusters and avoid obstacles. Collect points, stay fast, and see how far you can go!

title: Call of Duty - Black Ops
description: Call of Duty: Black Ops is a first-person shooter set during the Cold War. Engage in intense missions, multiplayer battles, and covert operations to complete your objectives.

title: Crazy Cattle 3D
description: Smash the cattle and dodge obstacles in 3D chaos. Collect points, avoid crashes, and master the herd!

title: Cuphead
description: Cuphead. A fast-paced run-and-gun game with 1930s cartoon visuals. Battle bizarre bosses, dodge endless attacks, and test your skills in a tough but rewarding adventure.

title: Drive Mad
description: Take control of a wobbly car. Navigate obstacles without flipping over. Each level gets trickier and more creative. Precision driving leads you to victory.

title: Driven Wild
description: Driven Wild is an adrenaline-fueled racing game where speed and skill are everything. Dodge obstacles, pull off crazy stunts, and survive as long as you can on the wild roads.

title: Doom
description: Doom is a fast-paced shooter where you battle demons from Hell across futuristic bases and fiery landscapes. Blast through hordes of enemies with powerful weapons in this iconic action game.

title: Drift Hunters
description: Get behind the wheel and race high-speed cars on thrilling tracks. Master sharp drifts, upgrade your vehicles, and compete to become the ultimate drift champion!

title: Drift Boss
description: Take control of your car and race through challenging tracks with precision. Drift around corners, avoid obstacles, and push your skills to dominate every course!

title: Escape Road
description: Race down a dangerous road filled with obstacles and traps! Dodge, weave, and survive as long as you can while the speed keeps rising. Can you make your great escape?

title: Escape Road 2
description: Escape Road 2 puts you in a high-speed chase where every turn tests your reflexes. Dodge traffic, avoid obstacles, and see how far you can escape before the road catches up.

title: Elastic Face
description: Elastic Face. Stretch, twist, and pull a goofy face like it is made of rubber! Drag different parts and watch it snap back with hilarious expressions. Simple, silly, and endlessly entertaining.

title: FNAF
description: Survive five nights as a security guard in a haunted pizzeria where animatronics come to life. Watch the cameras, manage your power, and do nott let them catch you in this terrifying survival horror!

title: Granny 2
description: Trapped againâ€”this time with Granny and Grandpa! Sneak, hide, and solve puzzles to escape their house before it is too late.

title: Gun Spin!
description: Test your luck and nerve! Spin the chamber and see if you survive. Quick reflexes and a bit of courage decide your fate.

title: Hole.io
description: Control a black hole and swallow everything in sight! Compete with others, grow bigger, and dominate the city until nothing is left standing.

title: Happy Room
description: Happy Room is a physics-based sandbox game where you test weapons and traps on dummies. Experiment with creative setups to cause maximum chaos and destruction.

title: Happy Wheels
description: HHappy Wheels is a ragdoll physics game where you navigate deadly obstacle courses. Ride as various characters and survive crazy traps to reach the finish.

title: HEI$T
description: HEI$T is an action-packed game where you plan and execute high-stakes robberies. Strategize, avoid security, and collect as much loot as you can.

title: Infinite Craft
description: Infinite Craft is a sandbox building game where you create and explore endless worlds. Gather resources, craft tools, and build anything you can imagine.

title: Interactive Buddy
description: Interactive Buddy is a sandbox game where you interact with a customizable buddy. Experiment with toys, weapons, and tools to see how they react.

title: Jailbreak Obby
description: Escape the prison by running, jumping, and dodging deadly traps! Test your parkour skills through tricky obstacle courses and see if you can break free.

title: Knightmare Tower
description: Launch into battle and slice through waves of monsters as you climb the tower! Rescue princesses, upgrade your gear, and see how high you can go in this fast-paced action adventure.

title: Learn to Fly
description: Help a determined penguin learn to fly! Launch, glide, and upgrade your gear to soar farther each time in this addictive adventure.

title: Minecraft 1.11.2
description: Explore, build, and survive in Minecraft 1.11.2. Craft tools, fight mobs, and shape your world block by block. Endless creativity, adventure, and survival await.

title: Minecraft 1.20.1
description: Gather, build, and survive in Minecraft 1.20.1. Explore new biomes, craft gear, and unleash your creativity block by block.

title: Nazi Zombies Portable
description: Fight endless waves of zombies in this portable FPS! Survive as long as you can, unlock weapons, and hold your ground against the undead.

title: New York Shark
description: New York Shark is a chaotic action game where you control a giant shark wreaking havoc across the city. Bite, smash, and cause destruction as you take down everything in your path.

title: Only Up
description: Climb higher and higher through wild obstacles and tricky platforms! One wrong step sends you back down, so keep your balance and see how far you can go.

title: Obby 99% Will Lose
description: Obby 99% Will Lose is a challenging obstacle course game that tests your skills and patience. Navigate tricky jumps and traps to reach the endâ€”if you can beat the 99% who fail!

title: Punch the Trump
description: Step into the ring and take your best shots at Trump! Throw punches, dodge, and see how long you can last in this over-the-top boxing parody.

title: Poly Track
description: Poly Track takes racing to the next level with smoother controls, sharper visuals, and dynamic tracks. Test your speed, precision, and skill as you compete to set record-breaking times.

title: Quake III Arena
description: Quake III Arena throws you into intense, fast-paced arena battles where reflexes and precision rule. Blast through opponents with iconic weapons and dominate maps in pure multiplayer chaos.

title: Ragdoll Archers
description: Ragdoll Archers is a physics-based bow battle where wobbly warriors fling arrows in chaotic duels. Aim carefully, adapt to ragdoll physics, and outlast your opponent in hilarious, unpredictable fights.

title: Raft
description: Raft is an ocean survival game where you collect drifting debris to build and upgrade your floating home. Explore islands, craft tools, and fight to stay alive against the dangers of the sea.

title: Steal A Brainrot
description: Steal a Brainrot is a chaotic battle where you snatch brainrot from rivals while protecting your own. Outsmart, dodge, and scheme your way to the crown in nonstop fast-paced fun

title: Super Mario 64
description: Super Mario 64 is a 3D platformer where Mario explores magical worlds through paintings in Peach is Castle. Collect stars, defeat Bowser, and save the princess in this classic adventure.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Sonic the Hedgehog is a high-speed platformer where you race as Sonic to stop Dr. Robotnik. Dash through loops, collect rings, and save your animal friends.

title: slope
description: Slope is a fast-paced endless runner where you guide a ball down a neon track at breakneck speed. Dodge obstacles, stay on course, and see how far you can roll before the fall

title: Snow Rider 3D
description: Snow Rider 3D is a fast-paced endless sledding game where you race down snowy slopes while avoiding obstacles. Collect gifts along the way to unlock new sleds and see how far you can go without crashing.

title: Super Mario 63
description: Super Mario 63 is a fan-made platformer mixing classic Mario with 64 and Sunshine. Explore levels, collect shines, and enjoy a fresh 2D adventure.

title: Sniper Shot
description: Sniper Shot: Bullet Time is a sniper shooting game where you take out enemies with precision. Use slow-motion shots to plan your attacks and complete challenging missions.

title: Subway Surfers: Mexico
description: Subway Surfers: Mexico takes you through colorful Mexican streets filled with trains and obstacles. Collect coins, dodge obstacles, and unlock new characters and hoverboards as you run.

title: Troll Face Quest 1
description: Troll Face Quest 1 is a puzzle comedy game packed with tricky levels and ridiculous humor. Solve weird challenges, expect the unexpected, and get ready to be trolled at every turn

title: Time Shooter 2
description: Time Shooter 2 is a first-person shooter where time only moves when you do. Outsmart enemies by freezing time, dodging bullets, and using weapons strategically to clear each level.

title: Tomb of the Mask
description: Tomb of the Mask is an arcade-style maze game where a magical mask lets you climb walls and move at lightning speed. Navigate endless traps, enemies, and obstacles while collecting coins and power-ups.

title: Ultrakill
description: ULTRAKILL is a blood-soaked, fast-paced retro FPS where style and speed mean survival. Rip through hordes of demons with brutal weapons, fluid movement, and nonstop carnage.

title: Undertale Yellow
description: Undertale Yellow is a fan-made prequel to Undertale starring Clover, the seventh fallen human. Explore the Underground, meet new characters, and decide between mercy or battle.

title: Volley Random
description: Volley Random is a wacky volleyball game where every match feels unpredictable. Jump, flip, and smash the ball with ragdoll physics that keep the chaos fun and hilarious.

title: Vex
description: Vex is a challenging platformer where you navigate deadly traps and obstacles. Test your skills with precise jumps and speed through each level.

title: Villager
description: Villager is a sandbox simulation game where you build, trade, and explore your village. Manage resources, customize your home, and interact with quirky villagers.

title: Waterpool.io
description: Waterpool.io is a fun multiplayer game where you splash, bump, and push others out of the pool. Stay afloat, outlast your rivals, and claim victory in the ultimate water brawl.

title: You vs. 100 Skibidi
description: You vs. 100 Skibidi is a wild survival game where you face off against a swarm of chaotic Skibidi enemies. Fight, dodge, and outlast the madness to prove you are the last one standing.

title: Zen Word
description: Zen Word is a relaxing puzzle game where you connect letters to form words and clear levels. Calm visuals and soothing gameplay make it the perfect way to unwind while sharpening your mind.
